AbortSignalAny.summary: The AbortSignal.any() static method takes an iterable of abort signals and returns an . The returned abort signal is aborted when any of the input iterable abort signals are aborted. The {{domxref("AbortSignal.reason", "abort reason","","true")}} will be set to the reason of the first signal that is aborted. If any of the given abort signals are already aborted then so will be the returned .
